text: Uncle Marin, the Billionaire () is a 1979 Romanian comedy movie directed by Sergiu Nicolaescu and starring Amza Pellea, Draga Olteanu Matei, Jean Constantin, Ștefan Mihăilescu-Brăila, Sebastian Papaiani, Brandusa Manu, Ștefan Bănică. == Other websites == * Category:1979 comedy movies Category:Romanian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Sergiu Nicolaescu
title: Uncle Marin, the Billionaire
